roleset.name: make unimportant

example.name: the one example
example.text: The most important development in [Mr. Gorbachev]-1's policy for *trace*-1 marginalizing the opposition movement is the claim that the U.S.S.R. also suffers from terrorism.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'marginalize' based on wsj; nominal 'marginalization' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls remedy-45.7.

example.name: nominal rel: marginalization
example.text: No parents want to see their own children grow up under pressure and anxiety , but , in order to avoid marginalization by the assessment system , they have to , very reluctantly , send their own kids to various auxiliary classes and accompany their kids to stay up reciting textbooks and doing homework by themselves .
